nodes.documentation:
Trader rejects the exit request
Perhaps the investor made a false profit claim
This will now enter a dispute workflow managed on the client
nodes.name: rejectExit

nodes.documentation: Trader approves the exit by paying the nett profit back to the contract, under the name of the investor
